body_html:
The existing verbs implementation assumes GPU usage. For example the following line calls GPUUtil.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma.cc#L714

You can make it work with CPU-only cases, with some code change, I suppose.

body:
The existing verbs implementation assumes GPU usage. For example the following line calls GPUUtil.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma.cc#L714

You can make it work with CPU-only cases, with some code change, I suppose.
